AI Description: m4 is a general-purpose macro processor designed to be used with any programming language or data file format. It is commonly used to generate source code or text files and is often used as part of the build process for software development.
Core Features: Macro Processing Capabilities, Text Manipulation & Generation, Support For Defining & Calling Macros, Conditional Processing, Loop Constructs
General Tags: Macro Processor, Text Processing, Software Development, Build Process
